name: io.bytes.per.checksum
explanation: The value of io.bytes.per.checksum is too large, which may cause the Java heap space OutOfMemoryError. It should not be larger than io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.client.thread-count
explanation: The number of threads for the resource manager scheduler client is set to 50. This could potentially lead to high memory usage and cause the Java heap space OutOfMemoryError.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.containerlauncher.threadpool-initial-size
explanation: The initial size of the thread pool to launch containers in the app master is set to 10. This could potentially lead to high memory usage and cause the Java heap space OutOfMemoryError.
